title: THE WITCHER Season 2 Casting Update Explained - Mark Hamill, Mads Mikkelsen, Kristofer Hivju
author: Think Story
comment: Damn, I really would've liked to have seen Mads Mikkelsen as Vesemir. Who do you think should play him?

“The most important role everyone has been speculating about is that of-“

Me: UMAMAMAMAMA
To be honest Mads would’ve kinda stolen the show as Vesemir, he is cool AF
Sean Bean, it could be a role he doesn't die in...
That sucks Mads would have been great! But also happy with Mark.
description:
In this WITCHER SEASON 2 casting update we look at new characters as well as who will play Vesemir. Mark Hamill, Mads Mikkelsen, Michael Keaton, and Kristofer Hivju rumours.
